title: Increases the tax credit allowed volunteer firefighters or ambulance workers from two hundred dollars to five hundred dollars
summary: Increases the tax credit allowed volunteer firefighters or ambulance workers from two hundred dollars to five hundred dollars; such credit is treated as a payment, if tax is less than credit, difference is paid to taxpayer.
